caption.title: Pacific Ocean SST analysis.
caption.p: (a) Spatial structure of REOF mode 1; units are arbitrary and contour interval is 1 unit. SST trends (°C decade -1) estimated over 30 year periods for (b) 1927–1956; (c) 1957–1986; (d) 1987–2016; contour interval is 0.025°C decade -1 and open (filled) circles indicate grid points with statistically significant trends at the 95% (99%) confidence level, as determined by the Mann-Kendall non parametric test.
